page.title: 15Employment in Adbaston
page.content: Unemployment is less than the National average, but several teenagers are on Y.T.S. Farming, being highly mechanised employs relatively few people. Many Adbaston people work at Cadbury's Foods Ltd, Knighton, 1km outside survey area. In Bishops Offley, Walk Mill and Offley Hay are many commuters in management, sales, engineering and private business fields. Professional people include a banker,college lecturers, an airline pilot, a barrister and a headteacher. 25% of wives work, others help husbands by doing clerical or farm work at home. Other occupations include building, armed forces, oil drilling and acting.
